name: VR UAV Attack
description:
This is a drone-themed VR shooting game, suitable for flying shooting players who like war story backgrounds.
Players can manipulate the drone to shoot on the ground. The drone has a range of 102 meters, a height of 76 meters, and a speed of 5 meters per second. The game requires players to destroy the enemy’s 10 tanks and 12 motor vehicles and obtain a score of 10,000 points in order to successfully achieve the goal.

Instructions:
The right handle touchpad controls the drone to move up and down and left and right to rotate, move the handle to aim, and the trigger button to launch the missile;
The menu button can open the menu, the right handle can interact, and the trigger button is OK.
